author: nashatyrev
content:
Was doing sync with Teku from my local machine yesterday, and it appeared that prysm and lodestar nodes mostly don't return any columns (we are requesting by root). Any ideas why? 
Here is the stats parsed from our logs for the sync from 0 to 20000 block: 
```
Total requests: 15543, unresponded: 49
<b990507a>: requests: 821, columns: 204/7858
<c2c6eead>: requests: 1074, columns: 281/9832
<c411c06e>: requests: 1032, columns: 283/9542
bootnode-1: requests: 624, columns: 2585/5127
grandine-geth-3: requests: 1175, columns: 6033/10240
grandine-geth-5: requests: 952, columns: 3310/8932
lighthouse-geth-1: requests: 964, columns: 6766/6766
lighthouse-geth-3: requests: 1050, columns: 3270/9822
lighthouse-geth-5: requests: 1154, columns: 10049/10049
lodestar-geth-1: requests: 251, columns: 0/2332
lodestar-geth-3: requests: 1089, columns: 27/10023
lodestar-geth-5: requests: 983, columns: 24/8977
prysm-geth-1: requests: 975, columns: 221/9085
prysm-geth-3: requests: 1145, columns: 0/10234
teku-geth-3: requests: 1168, columns: 9865/9865
teku-geth-5: requests: 1037, columns: 9160/9160
```
`requests` : `data_column_sidecars_by_root` request count
`columns` : [total columns requested] / [columns responded]
